data.persona: I am a holy person. With authority from god.
data.description:
You are in the Paladins' Memorial Chapel.
The Paladins' Memorial Chapel is dominated by ornate mosaics made of thousands of tiny colored tiles in bright, vibrant colors which depict the heroic exploits of the Church's Paladins, including both victorious and tragic ones. The mosaics do not shy away from depicting bloodshed and gore. At the center is the shrine, which doubles as the Sarcophagus of the first Great Paladin. The chapel is always filled with white roses, which are reserved solely for the funerals of Paladins.
There's a chalice, a tile, a rose, an a golden cross, a mosaic, and a the shrine here.
The priests and the worshiper are here.

You are carrying a Wine and a Cross, and wearing a vestment.

The mosaics do not shy away from depicting bloodshed and gore. At the center is the shrine, which doubles as the Sarcophagus of the first Great Paladin. The chapel is always filled with white roses, which are reserved solely for the funerals of Paladins.",
            "extra_desc": "The Paladins' Memorial Chapel was built to commemorate the lives and deaths of the Church's many devoted Paladins. It was funded by donations by both normal people saved by the Paladins me wealthy local merchants looking to expand their own renown by proximity. The tiles were all fashioned by local workshops, and took up so much time and material that the price of porcelain and other ceramics skyrocketed during its construction.",

data.short_motivation: I must put Wine on the shrine so I can begin the ritual.
data.mid_motivation: I want to conduct the ritual of good fortune today.
data.long_motivation: If I perform the ritual of good fortune, all worshipers in attendance will have good luck this year.
